member.name: IDWriteFontResource.CreateFontFace
member.summary: Creates a font face instance with specific axis values.
member.param: Font face simulation flags for algorithmic emboldening and italicization.
A pointer to an array containing a list of font axis values. The array should be the size (the number of elements) indicated by the fontAxisValueCount argument.
The number of font axis values contained in the fontAxisValues array.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font face object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetAxisNames
member.summary: Retrieves the localized names of a font axis.
member.param: Font axis, from 0 to minus 1.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created localized strings object.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetAxisValueNameCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of named values for a specific axis.
member.param: Font axis, from 0 to minus 1.
member.returns: The number of named values for the axis specified by axisIndex.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetAxisValueNames
member.summary: Retrieves the localized names of specific values for a font axis.
member.param: Font axis, from 0 to minus 1.
Value index, from 0 to minus 1.
Range of the named value.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created localized strings object.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetDefaultFontAxisValues
member.summary: Retrieves the default values for all axes supported by the font resource.
member.param: A pointer to an array of DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_VALUE structures into which GetDefaultFontAxisValues writes the list of font axis values. You're responsible for managing the size and the lifetime of this array. Call to determine the size of array to allocate.
The maximum number of font axis values to write into the memory block pointed to by fontAxisValues.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.
|Return value|Description| |-|-| |E_INVALIDARG|fontAxisValueCount doesn't match the value returned by GetFontAxisCount.|

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetFontAxisAttributes
member.summary: Retrieves attributes describing the given axis, such as whether the font author recommends to hide the axis in user interfaces.
member.param: Font axis, from 0 to minus 1.
member.returns: The attributes for the given axis, or DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_ATTRIBUTES_NONE if axisIndex is beyond the font count.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetFontAxisCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of axes supported by the font resource. This includes both static and variable axes (see ).
member.returns: The number of axes defined by the font face.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetFontAxisRanges
member.summary: Retrieves the value ranges of each axis.
member.param: A pointer to an array of DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_RANGE structures into which GetFontAxisRanges writes the list of font axis value ranges. You're responsible for managing the size and the lifetime of this array. Call to determine the size of array to allocate.
The maximum number of font axis value ranges to write into the memory block pointed to by fontAxisRanges.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.
|Return value|Description| |-|-| |E_INVALIDARG|fontAxisValueCount doesn't match the value returned by GetFontAxisCount.|

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetFontFaceIndex
member.summary: Retrieves the zero-based index of the font face within its font file. If the font file contains a single face, then the return value is zero.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the font face within its font file.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.GetFontFile
member.summary: Retrieves the font file of the resource.
member.param: The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to the font file object.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFontResource.HasVariations
member.summary: Determines whether this font face's resource supports any variable axes. When true, at least one in the font resource has a non-empty range (maxValue > minValue).
member.returns: true if the font face's resource supports any variable axes. Otherwise, false.

summary.para: Provides axis information for a font resource, and is used to create specific font face instances.
